page.title: 20TRANSPORT _ BORTH
page.content: {Trains} There are two routes through Borth, both very popular with tourists and useful for locals all year. Cambrian Coast runs N_S,Aberystwyth _Pwllheli. Regarded as one of the most beautiful routes in the British Isles. Central Wales runs N_NE,Shrewsbury_ Aberystwyth. Also very scenic. People can travel from Borth to all parts of the British Isles via Shrewsbury. All normal passenger trains stop at Borth. The single track line has no passing loop. There are between five and eight trains travelling to Aberystwyth and northwards on weekdays and one train on summer Sundays. The line is to be modernised and the 'Sprinter',a new train introduced. {Buses }run through Borth every hour on the hour on weekdays 10.30a.m._ 10.30p.m., with no buses on Sundays.
